line: Sometimes quiet is violent
Wish we could turn back time, to the good old days
My name's Blurryface and I care what you think
I'm taking my time on my ride
I’m fairly local, I’ve been around
I created this world to feel some control
I don’t bother anyone
You’ll have to come and find me
No one else is dealing with your demons
Stay alive, stay alive for me
Don’t trust a perfect person and don’t trust a song that’s flawless
Peace will win and fear will lose
I’m a goner, somebody catch my breath
They say, stay in your lane, boy
We used to play pretend, wake up, you need the money
We don't believe what's on TV
All my friends are heathens, take it slow
The world around us is burning but we're so cold
There’s an infestation in my mind’s imagination
We’re broken people
If you’re one of us, then roll with us
This ain't a noose, this is a leash
Am I the only one I know waging my wars behind my face and above my throat?
I'll be holding on to you
I’m not sure I want to give you tools that can destroy my heart
And now I just sit in silence
I'll morph to someone else, defense mechanism mode
I’m standing in front of you, I’m trying to be so cool
Scared of my own ceiling
You fell asleep in my car, I drove the whole time
